body:
closes #9188 

This implements the idea discussed in the ticket above. From user perspective a sample output is:
```console
$ spack buildcache preview hdf5
Relocatable nodes
--------------------------------
[-]  hdf5@1.10.3%gcc@7.3.0~cxx~debug~fortran~hl~mpi+pic+shared+szip~threadsafe arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^libszip@2.1.1%gcc@7.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
[+]      ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@7.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64 
```
meaning that in this DAG `hdf5` might not be relocatable, while `libszip` and `zlib` surely are.
title: Added a sub-command to show if packages are relocatable
